perturbation.changed_text: TERM: The term of this agreement shall automatically renew annually unless either party provides written notice of termination at least 30 days prior to the annual renewal date.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states a fixed term. The modified text introduces automatic renewal with a cancellation clause, contradicting the fixed term and creating uncertainty about the contract's end date. This automatic renewal conflicts with section 7 which supersedes, cancels, and terminates previous agreements.

perturbation.original_text:
RATES:
Unless Shipper and Transporter have agreed to a rate other than the maximum rate, rates shall be Transporter's maximum rates
and charges plus all applicable surcharges in effect from time to time under the applicable Rate Schedule (as stated above) on
file with the Commission unless otherwise agreed to by the parties in writing. Provisions governing a Rate other than the
maximum shall be set forth in this Paragraph 9 and/or on Appendix B hereto.
perturbation.changed_text:
RATES:
Rates shall be determined solely at the discretion of the Transporter, and may be changed at any time without prior notice to the Shipper. Any rates previously agreed upon are superseded by this clause. Provisions governing a Rate other than the maximum shall be set forth in this Paragraph 9 and/or on Appendix B hereto.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that rates will be the maximum rate unless otherwise agreed in writing. The modified text gives the Transporter sole discretion to change rates at any time, contradicting the prior agreement and creating uncertainty about rate stability.

perturbation.original_text:
Upon termination of this Agreement, Shipper's and Transporter's obligations to each other arising under this Agreement, prior to
the date of termination, remain in effect and are not being terminated by any provision of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: Upon termination of this Agreement, all rights and obligations of both the Shipper and Transporter shall immediately cease, without any continuing liability or obligation whatsoever, unless explicitly stated otherwise in a separate agreement. Any obligations arising before termination are also immediately voided. Any obligations arising before termination are also immediately voided.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause states that obligations prior to termination remain in effect. The modified clause states that ALL obligations, including those prior to termination, cease upon termination, creating a direct contradiction and uncertainty regarding liabilities after the contract ends.
